name: Competitor Analysis
description: Compare feature parity and user perceptions across competing products. Track what users like about competitors and switching triggers.
author: OpenInsights

tags.name: We Have
tags.description: Feature we have that competitors lack

tags.name: They Have
tags.description: Feature competitors have that we lack

tags.name: Switch To Them If
tags.description: Reasons users would switch to competitor

tags.name: Switch To Us If
tags.description: Reasons users would switch to us

aiPrompts.autoTaggingPrompt:
Identify competitive intelligence:
- Direct competitor mentions and comparisons
- Feature parity observations (we have, they have, both have)
- Perception statements (better, worse, similar)
- Switching triggers (what would make them switch)

Tag each mention with the appropriate category.
aiPrompts.projectSummaryPrompt:
Create a competitive analysis summary:
1. Feature comparison matrix
2. Perception summary by competitor
3. Top switching triggers (both directions)
4. Opportunity areas where we can differentiate

projectSettings.goals: Understand competitive positioning and identify differentiation opportunities
